channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WA

item.title: Report E-2024040196

item.title: Report E-2024040122
item.description:
Report E-2024040122

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-09T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-02
  • City: KENT
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: CLEAN HARBORS ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Approximately 1800 on 4/2/2024 an employee was conducting a yard check and discovered a liquid leaking from the back of a trailer. A clean up team was contacted and proceeded to contain leak and clean up spill. Approximately five gallons was released. Spill was cleaned up and repacked for transport.

item.title: Report X-2024040069
item.description:
Report X-2024040069

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-05T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-28
  • City: TACOMA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RECIEVED A CALL TO DOOR 164, USED PROTECTION GEAR TO RESPOND TO CALL, NOTICED IT WAS A HAZMAT PLACED ON PROTECTION GEAR, GRABBED DECISSION TREE TO FOLLOW THE PROCESS, RETREAVED PACKAGE, AND RETURNED TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROSESSING.
